content: this text summarizes the progress of a legal case involving a division of assets a mediator adv r g was appointed to oversee the case the case was filed on 05112014 and the parties agreed to attempt mediation on 12162014 however the meeting was postponed twice and finally took place on 03032015 during the meeting the parties reached an agreement which was documented in a private writing attached to the conciliation minutes the mediator acknowledged the agreement and declared the proceedings closed the costs of the mediation were determined to be €116713 including vat the summary concludes with the date and location of the meeting
